location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP No. 3 MILITARY LESSONS OF THE ARAB REBELLION IN PALESTINE, 1936. (Section of Survey of Palestine 1:100,000 Series illustrating "Operation X")'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on tracing paperDimensions: 610 x 494mm, on sheet 670 x 556mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies Military Lessons of the Arab Rebellion in Palestine, 1936, and illustrates a military operation known as 'Operation X'. The sheet is intended to be placed over the Survey of Palestine map at folio 143. The map shows a region of central Palestine, indicating brigade boundaries, routes, troop positions and areas occupied by rebel bands.
